info.name: Job Recommender API Complete Extended
info.description: A comprehensive collection for the Job Recommender API with extended functionality including authentication, job management, project management, applications, recommendations, and more.

item.name: Jobs

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Senior Full Stack Developer",
    "company": "TechCorp Innovations",
    "description": "We are seeking an experienced Full Stack Developer to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have strong skills in both frontend and backend development, with a focus on creating scalable, high-performance web applications.",
    "requirements": ["JavaScript", "TypeScript", "React", "Node.js", "MongoDB", "AWS"],
    "location": "New York, NY",
    "employment_type": "Full-time",
    "experience_level": "Senior",
    "industry": "Technology",
    "responsibilities": [
        "Design and implement scalable backend services using Node.js",
        "Develop responsive and interactive user interfaces using React",
        "Collaborate with product managers and designers to define feature specifications",
        "Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code",
        "Participate in code reviews and mentor junior developers",
        "Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines"
    ],
    "preferred_qualifications": [
        "5+ years of professional software development experience",
        "Strong knowledge of JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern web frameworks",
        "Experience with cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure)",
        "Understanding of containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes",
        "Experience with agile development methodologies"
    ],
    "tech_stack": ["JavaScript", "TypeScript", "React", "Node.js", "MongoDB", "AWS", "Docker", "Kubernetes"],
    "remote_option": true,
    "work_mode": ["Hybrid", "Remote"],
    "salary_range": {
        "min": 120000,
        "max": 160000,
        "currency": "USD"
    },
    "benefits": [
        "Health, dental, and vision insurance",
        "401(k) matching",
        "Unlimited PTO",
        "Home office stipend",
        "Professional development budget",
        "Flexible work hours"
    ],
    "application_deadline": "2023-12-31",
    "posted_date": "2023-09-15",
    "contact_email": "careers@techcorp.com",
    "employer_id": "{{employer_id}}"
}

Get all active projects
Get projects filtered by status (open, in_progress, completed, cancelled)
Get details of a specific project
Get projects posted by the current employer

Search for projects using semantic search

item.description: Project management endpoints for creating, viewing, updating, and deleting project postings

item.name: Applications

body.raw:
{
    "job_id": "{{job_id}}",
    "cover_letter": "Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the Senior Full Stack Developer position at TechCorp Innovations. With over 5 years of experience in developing scalable web applications using React, Node.js, and AWS, I believe I am well-qualified for this role.

In my current position at Tech Solutions Inc., I have led a team of developers in building and maintaining a high-traffic e-commerce platform that serves over 100,000 daily users. I have extensive experience with the technologies mentioned in your job posting, including JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, and Docker.

I am particularly interested in joining TechCorp Innovations because of your focus on innovative solutions and your commitment to creating impactful technology. I am confident that my technical expertise and collaborative approach would make me a valuable addition to your team.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experience align with your needs.

Sincerely,
John Developer",
    "resume_url": "https://storage.example.com/resumes/john-developer-resume.pdf",
    "notes": "I'm particularly interested in full-stack positions that allow me to work on both frontend and backend technologies."
}

request.description: Create a new job application (for candidates only)

body.raw:
{
    "project_id": "{{project_id}}",
    "cover_letter": "Dear Project Manager,

I am submitting my application for the E-commerce Mobile App Development project at TechCorp Innovations. As a mobile developer with extensive experience in React Native and e-commerce applications, I am confident in my ability to deliver a high-quality solution that meets all your requirements.

In my previous work, I have successfully completed several mobile application projects, including an e-commerce app for a retail client that increased their mobile sales by 45%. I have hands-on experience with all the technologies specified in your project description, including React Native, TypeScript, Redux, Node.js, MongoDB, and AWS Amplify.

I am particularly excited about this project because of the comprehensive approach to the e-commerce experience, from product browsing to secure checkout and order tracking. I have implemented similar features in past projects and understand the complexities involved.

My availability aligns perfectly with your timeline, and I am ready to start immediately if selected.

Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
John Developer",
    "resume_url": "https://storage.example.com/resumes/john-developer-portfolio.pdf",
    "notes": "I've implemented Stripe payment integration in three previous projects and have experience with both iOS and Android app store submissions.",
    "availability": {
        "start_date": "2023-10-15",
        "hours_per_week": 30,
        "preferred_working_hours": "9:00 AM - 5:00 PM EST"
    }
}
